data.Name: Ingrown
data.Bio: 1. Punk band from Pennsylvania in 2012. 2. Ingrown belongs to the elite DepthCORE collective. The Internationally acclaimed art and music group took him on board and he became a very active member contributing more music in a year, then some have in their entire time in depthCORE. Alas, one comes to the sheer talent he has. demonstrating time and time again, how beautiful the world is in his sonic landscapes. Read more on Last.fm
